english.segment1: There is a part of me. That's only visiting. Torn from eternity. A stranger here
english.segment2: The awkward mingling of. The loveless and beloved. So far from things above. While I am here
english.segment3: So when the last notes of my soul's summer symphony. Go stealing through this old world's cold garden gates. I will hold no fear as You close my book of hours. And the hands of heaven carry me. Carry me home to stay
english.segment4: O Death where is your sting. Your tears and your tremblings. His peace is lingering. Even now
english.segment5: O Grave the battle's fought (no graver battles fought). Your vict'ry has been lost. To Christ who gave it all. To take me now
